sentences.sentence: I Googled bariatric surgery Washington d.c..
sentences.translation: 我上网搜索了华盛顿州的减肥手术信息。

sentences.sentence: Adjustable gastric banding is the second most popular form of bariatric surgery.
sentences.translation: 可调节胃扎带手术是第二受欢迎的减肥手术。

sentences.sentence: Even if your insurer covers bariatric surgery, make inquiries about the fees involved.
sentences.translation: 尽管你的保险公司包括了减肥手术，你还需要去询问包括哪些费用。
